problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC的周长为16．点D是AB边的中点,BD=2,过点D作AB的垂线l,E是l上任意一点,则△AEC的周长最小值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of △ABC is N_0. Point D is the midpoint of the AB, BD = N_1, passing point D is the vertical line l of AB, and E is any point on l, then the minimum perimeter of △AEC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵点D是AB边的中点,BD=2,∴AB=2BD=4,∵△ABC的周长为16,∴AC+BC=12,如图,连接BE,∵点D是AB边的中点,l⊥AB,∴l是AB的垂直平分线,∴AE=BE,∴AE+CE=BE+CE,∵BE+CE≥BC,∴当B,E,C在同一直线上时,BE+CE的最小值等于BC的长,而AC长不变,∴△AEC的周长最小值等于AC+BC=12,故选:A．
